title: Client TCP connection support
description: Add TCP connection capability to the fugue client (fugue-client), enabling it to connect to remote daemons over TCP in addition to the default Unix socket. This is Phase 2 of remote peering support, completing the remote workflow by allowing clients to connect to TCP-enabled daemons.
user_impact: Enables remote workflows and cross-machine fugue control. When combined with FEAT-066, allows users to connect fugue client to remote daemons via SSH tunnels, enabling seamless remote session management.
